name: The Radio Host
description:
It's a (very short) interactive fic, there isn't much to it. No name or gendered pronouns are used, you're just referred to as "the Host" or "you". I only spent a day on this, not a full day, 4 hours maximum so there isn't a lot.  

The Slight Backstory

After a nuclear explosion, those that survived began to make the waste left, a home. You, the Host, are an immortal who has been doing this for around 20 or so years, and you  wonder if you should stop.
